722905f-a.text:
Riverside Park:
1. Riverside Drive, north from and including 95th Street. April 29, 1934. P. L. Sperr.

2. The same, slightly northward. April 29, 1934. P. L. Sperr.

3. The same, at an earlier date. Note the U.S.S. Illinois at the
foot of East 98th Street. July 11, 1931. P. L. Sperr.
